video.title: LEGO: Legends of Chima
video.synopsis: In the once-peaceful land of Chima, conflict breaks out between eight animal tribes over Chi, a substance that can both sustain life and destroy it.

episodes.synopsis: When young Cragger becomes king of the Crocodiles, his former best friend, Laval the Lion, becomes his worst enemy.
episodes.title: Legends of Chima

episodes.synopsis: King Cragger's mischievous sister Crooler is scheming and uses a mysterious plant to cloud Cragger's mind.
episodes.title: The Great Story

episodes.synopsis: Cragger tricks Laval into withholding Chi from the Crocodile tribe. This reignites the hostilities between the Lions and Crocodiles.
episodes.title: The Warrior Within

episodes.synopsis: Laval and Eris the Eagle take a Lion tank for a ride around Chima, but it may not be such a good idea.
episodes.title: The Joy Ride

episodes.synopsis: Cragger hires the Ravens to steal Laval's precious Speedor. And suddenly the prize of the races, the Golden Chi, has also disappeared.
episodes.title: Market Day

episodes.synopsis: The Crocodiles hire the Ravens to trick the Wolves into attacking the Eagle Spires. But it is all part of an elaborate plot.
episodes.title: Attack on Eagle Spire

episodes.synopsis: On the night of the Hundred Year Moon, the Wolves are running wild and causing havoc.
episodes.title: The Hundred Year Moon

episodes.synopsis: The Sacred Pool in the Lion Temple has produced the biggest orb of Golden Chi ever. Both the Wolves and Crocodiles are scheming.
episodes.title: The Biggest Race Ever

episodes.synopsis: Cragger angers the Gorilla tribe, and they march to the Crocodile Swamp to teach him a lesson. But the Gorilla Mechs are not fit for the swampy water.
episodes.title: Gorillas Gone Wild

episodes.synopsis: With the aid of the Wolves, Crooler causes chaos at the Speedor races and tries to steal all of the Chi from the Lion Temple.
episodes.title: Anarchy at the Races

episodes.synopsis: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen Chi. Soon all the other tribes of Chima have none.
episodes.title: The CHI Jackers

episodes.synopsis: The Wolves are still stealing Chi. When a load of it falls into the Gorge of Eternal Depth, Laval, Eris and Gorzan must try to retrieve it.
episodes.title: Balancing Act

episodes.synopsis: Cragger and the Crocodiles are taken prisoners by the Wolves. But Laval is determined to free his old friend.
episodes.title: Crocodile Tears

episodes.synopsis: Cragger has been freed and wants to give out Chi to all tribes of Chima, but he has none. He employs a Raven alchemist to produce some fake Chi.
episodes.title: Fake CHI, Real Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Chima is peaceful yet again. Laval and Cragger go on a joyful Speedor cruise. But the Ravens use the peace to move into Eagle Spires.
episodes.title: Ravens vs. Eagles

episodes.synopsis: Laval and Cragger attempt to get all of the tribes to agree on a lasting peace in Chima. But soon, the peace talks turn into one big fight.
episodes.title: Reunion Gone Wrong

episodes.synopsis: Laval's actions to break up the fighting at the peace talks force the Lion King Lagravis to exile his own son.
episodes.title: Laval in Exile

episodes.synopsis: A strange black cloud appears around the floating Mount Cavora, source of the Chi. Laval and Eris investigate, but the cloud seems to fight back.
episodes.title: The Black Cloud

episodes.synopsis: The Chi falls have run dry. Eris and the Beavers try to get to Mount Cavora to learn why. The Crocodiles blame the Lions.
episodes.title: CHIMA Falls

episodes.synopsis: The Lion Temple is under attack, and it is only a matter of time before it will be overrun by Crocodiles, Wolves, Ravens and Rhinos.
episodes.title: For Chima!

episodes.synopsis: While in the Outlands battling the carnivorous plants and the mysterious black cloud, the heroes of Chima meet an enigmatic ally.
episodes.title: Into the Outlands

episodes.synopsis: With the Gorillas and Rhinos being held captive by a tribe of creepy Spiders, the heroes of Chima must come up with a clever plan of attack.
episodes.title: A Tangled Web

episodes.synopsis: Laval must persuade exiled lion Lavertus to join a fight against the Beast Raven -- by defeating him in a Speedor race.
episodes.title: The Legend Thief

episodes.synopsis: After the Scorpions and Spiders set up a trap, the heroes of Chima must embark on a daring mission to free the Beast Eagle and the Bear.
episodes.title: The Eagle and the Bear

episodes.synopsis: The tribe takes to their Legend Beasts to rescue Worriz and Cragger, who were captured by the Crawlers when they attempted a mission on their own.
episodes.title: Tooth or Consequences

episodes.synopsis: While fighting the Crawlers in the Scorpion cave, Laval becomes cut off from the group and must find the Lion Legend Beast on his own.
episodes.title: This May Sting a Bit

episodes.synopsis: Eris is troubled by dreams and waking visions of being on fire; Scorm's CHI helps free Sir Fangar, who releases the Ice Hunters.
episodes.title: Fire Dreaming

episodes.synopsis: When the Ice Clan attacks, they're more than a match for Chima, who must retreat just to thaw out their defeated warriors.
episodes.title: Attack of the Ice Clan

episodes.synopsis: While Chima carries out revenge on the Ice Clan, Eris has a vision that leads the tribes to the Phoenix FIre Temple, where they encounter Fluminox.
episodes.title: Call of Cavora

episodes.synopsis: While telling the story of the Fire and Ice clans, Fluminox introduces the tribe to Fire CHI -- but there's a catch to using it.
episodes.title: Trial by Fire

episodes.synopsis: Laval, Cragger and Eris continue to pursue the Ice Clan, but their decision to turn back for Fire CHI gives Fluminox pause.
episodes.title: The Crescent

episodes.synopsis: Laval and Cragger launch a speedor attack on Fangar's fortress, but they face horrific consequences when they defy a warning from Fluminox.
episodes.title: Fired Up

episodes.synopsis: When Eris gets a vision of Mount Cavora's destruction, the Phoenix Tribe dispatches the Legend Beasts for protection.
episodes.title: Cool and Collected

episodes.synopsis: When members of the Mammoth Tribe trap the Rhino Tribe's Legend Beast in an attempt to take them down, they're awestruck by its snowboarding ability..
episodes.title: The Snowball Effect

episodes.synopsis: When Lagravis is taken captive, Laval is left to assume the throne while dealing with an onslaught of Hunters.
episodes.title: The King Thing

episodes.synopsis: The tribe frees the Crawlers while rescuing the captives from Fangar's fortress. As they flee, the fortress collapses with Li'ella trapped inside.
episodes.title: A Slippery Slope

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to save his daughter, Tormak betrays the Phoenix and steals the map known as the Artifact. But the theft doesn't go as planned.
episodes.title: The Artifact

episodes.synopsis: Flinx boldly confronts Fangar on his own but falls into a clever trap, forcing King Fluminox to stage a daring rescue mission in the Blazing Bastion.
episodes.title: The Phoenix Has Landed

episodes.synopsis: With CHIMA frozen, the heroes are trapped in the Gorge of Eternal Depth. But there's a spark of hope when a past ally makes a suprising return.
episodes.title: A Spark of Hope
